...reading life to the fullest...

The Budding Bookworm very much enjoys the occasional literary escape but is also fairly invested in reality.

You read if you can when you can, but there is no egoic entanglement in terms of how many books you’ve read and how fast you’ve read them.

About

The Literati Project is dedicated to helping readers find their literary personas and engage more deeply with their reading journeys.
